thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: RON GREENWOOD
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by RON GREENWOOD

author: RON GREENWOOD
title: RON GREENWOOD
text: Quite happy with the service from the staff we dealt with. The car met our needs and was quite economical. We had one BIG problem in that the car was riddled with Ants to the point that they infested our clothes, food and on ourselves while driving. If we had to come to Melbourne, The other issue was the GPS was not user friendly. Redspot would be used again.
